item.title: Report X-2024040126
item.description:
Report X-2024040126

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-11T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-02
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the MEMH facility a fiberboard box was found with signs of a release. The fiberboard box contained twenty smaller boxes and bubble wrap for dunnage. Each of the smaller boxes inside contained eight plastic bottles. The cap was loose on one of the bottles causing a release of its contents inside of the fiberboard box. All contents were placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.
